title: Is anything going to be done to Edge of Night?
body:
I know you all still feel violated from the Edge of Night meta and all, 

but according to Champion.gg and OP.GG 

Across every single elo the following champions 

( {{champion:35}}  {{champion:91}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:107}} )

either build {{item:3156}} instead or just flat out don't build it all. 

Edge of Night was literally made for the following champions yet they avoid it all costs. Something needs to be done because the item feels like complete shit to build right now and Maw feels better in every single way. Not to mention more armor being added into the game and tabi's still not being nerfed (ROFL) is really not helping it's cause either.
